CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Product_Line__c ), '16100','FEDERATED CLOUD', '13300','HOSTED SECURITY', '12100','HOSTED NETWORK SERVICES', '12200','MANAGED WAN SERVICES', '18100','TRADED GOODS', '14400','DISASTER RECOVERY AS A SERVICE', '14600','PLATFORM AS A SERVICE', '14700','PRIVATE CLOUD', '10100','MULTITENANT COLOCATION', '10200','COLOCATION SUPPORT ', '10300','DEDICATED BUILDING COLOCATION', '13100','MANAGED SECURITY', '14200','STORAGE AS A SERVICE', '14100','COMPUTE AS A SERVICE', '17100','IT MONITORING', '17200','IT ADMINISTRATION', '17300','IT PROFESSIONAL', '13200','PROFESSIONAL SECURITY', '14300','BACKUP & RECOVERY AS A SERVICE', '14500','SOFTWARE AS A SERVICE', 'Structured Cabling','Structured Cabling', 'Ad-hoc','Ad-hoc', '')
CustomField.label: Product Line Text
